issue.message: This call is to a method from API 28, the call containing class null is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 28. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(28) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(28).

This call is to a method from API 19, the call containing class androidx.biometric.BiometricFragment is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 19. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(19) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(19).
